Room.Name: D'Tan's Leather Armory
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small shop, filled with the smell of fine leather goods.
Room.LongDescription: D'Tan's Armory fits all races and all sizes, but is limited to cloth and leather armors. Mages have trouble with the heavy metal armors because they tend to interfere with their magical powers and thieves prefer leather because it makes them move much more quietly. D'Tan realizes these need and happily provides for them.
